select r.*, c.CORP_NAME, c.CORP_IMGURL, l.LANGUAGE_NAME, w.WORKKIND_NAME, a.AREA_ADD1, a.AREA_ADD2 from RECRUITANNOUNCE r join CORP c on r.user_no=c.user_no join LANGUAGE l on r.LANGUAGE_NO=l.LANGUAGE_NO join WORKKIND w on r.WORKKIND_NO = w.WORKKIND_NO join AREALIST a on r.AREALIST_NO = a.AREA_NO where (CORP_NAME like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR LANGUAGE_NAME like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR WORKKIND_NAME like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%')
and RECRUITANNOUNCE_ENDDATE>=sysdate
order by RECRUITANNOUNCE_ENDDATE
select * from language order by LANGUAGE_NO
select area_add2 from AREALIST where area_add1=#{areaAdd1}

select r.*, c.CORP_NAME, c.CORP_IMGURL, l.LANGUAGE_NAME, w.WORKKIND_NAME, a.AREA_ADD1, a.AREA_ADD2 from RECRUITANNOUNCE r join CORP c on r.user_no=c.user_no join LANGUAGE l on r.LANGUAGE_NO=l.LANGUAGE_NO join WORKKIND w on r.WORKKIND_NO = w.WORKKIND_NO join AREALIST a on r.AREALIST_NO = a.AREA_NO
and RECRUITANNOUNCE_ENDDATE>=sysdate
order by RECRUITANNOUNCE_ENDDATE
